features.feature1Description: It's noon, and you decide to travel for personal, family, or business reasons. Imagine taking off in 5 hours to your desired destination by booking a private jet in less than 5 minutes.
features.feature2Description: Saving time is the main goal of booking a private jet. That's why Fly Elite collaborates with the best airlines. Our algorithms optimize your flight by combining maximum data.
features.feature3Title: A Jet at Business Class Price
features.feature3Description: Fly Elite makes private jet travel accessible. Board in minutes, without wasting time, at business class prices - that's our commitment.

benefits.title: Why choose
benefits.benefit1Description: Compliance with the highest aviation safety standards

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Tell us your requirements and one of our experts will send you a quote
faq.question1: Can I leave at the last minute?
faq.answer1: Yes, you can leave at the last minute. The Fly Elite team certifies that your plane will take off 72 hours after your request (after approval from all relevant authorities).
faq.question2: Can I book my flight by phone?
faq.answer2: No, it is not possible to book your flight by phone. All bookings are made online via our secure platform.
faq.question3: What are the advantages of a private jet?
faq.answer3: A private jet offers you flexibility, time savings, optimal comfort and confidentiality. You avoid queues and travel according to your own schedule.
faq.answer4: Capacity varies depending on the type of aircraft. Our jets can accommodate from 4 to 14 passengers depending on the model chosen.
faq.answer5: Yes, you can modify your booking under certain conditions. Contact our team to learn about modification procedures.

intro.title: Book your private jet instantly
intro.paragraph1: It's noon, you decide to travel for personal, family, or business reasons. Imagine taking off in a few hours to your desired destination by booking a private jet in less than 5 minutes.
intro.paragraph2: At Fly Elite, we make business aviation accessible, simple and transparent. Our platform allows you to compare, book and fly with complete peace of mind.

features.feature1Description: Over 23,000 airports in 165 countries. Wherever you go, we'll take you there.
features.feature2Description: From light jets to long-haul aircraft, we have the perfect plane for every mission.
features.feature3Description: Book in less than 5 minutes. Takeoff possible a few hours after your request.
features.feature4Description: All our operators are certified and comply with the strictest safety standards.
features.feature5Description: A dedicated team available 24/7 to meet all your needs and requirements.
features.feature6Description: Travel in luxury and comfort with our high-end aircraft and premium services.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.step1Description: Use our form to indicate your itinerary, dates and number of passengers.
howItWorks.step2Description: Our team contacts you quickly with a personalized and transparent quote.
howItWorks.step3Description: Confirm your booking and get ready to experience an exceptional flight experience.

cta.title: Ready to take off?
cta.description: Request your personalized quote now and discover the excellence of private jet travel.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Find answers to your questions about our private jet services

booking.q1: How do I book a private jet flight?
booking.a1: You can book via our search form on the homepage. Select your departure and arrival airports, choose your dates, then submit your request. Our team will contact you quickly with a personalized quote.
booking.q2: What is the minimum notice required to book a flight?
booking.a2: We can arrange flights with just a few hours' notice. However, to ensure availability and benefit from the best rates, we recommend booking at least 24 to 48 hours in advance.
booking.q3: Can I modify or cancel my booking?
booking.a3: Yes, modifications and cancellations are possible according to your contract terms. Cancellation fees vary depending on the notice given. Contact our team for more details about your specific booking.

pricing.a1: Prices depend on several factors: flight distance, aircraft type, availability, airport taxes and additional services. Our 'Current Offers' display fixed prices for empty leg flights at reduced rates.
pricing.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.a2: We accept bank transfers, credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and check payments for regular clients. A deposit is usually required when booking.
pricing.a3: No, all our quotes are transparent and include all mandatory fees. The only possible additional costs concern optional services you choose (premium catering, ground transfers, etc.).

aircraft.q1: What types of aircraft do you offer?
aircraft.a1: Our fleet includes a wide range of aircraft, from light jets (4-6 passengers) to long-haul jets (12-16 passengers). Each aircraft meets the strictest safety standards and offers optimal comfort.
aircraft.a2: Yes, you can express your preferences when making your request. We will offer you available aircraft matching your needs in terms of capacity, range and budget.
aircraft.q3: What services are included on board?
aircraft.a3: All our flights include basic service: leather seats, Wi-Fi, refreshments and snacks. Premium services (gourmet meals, champagne, special equipment) can be added on request.

safety.a1: Absolutely. All our operators are certified and comply with the strictest aviation safety standards. Aircraft undergo regular maintenance and crews are highly qualified.
safety.q2: What documents are required to travel?
safety.a2: For domestic flights, a valid ID is sufficient. For international flights, a valid passport is required. Depending on the destination, a visa may be necessary. We will inform you of specific requirements.
safety.q3: What happens in case of unfavorable weather conditions?
safety.a3: Safety is our absolute priority. In case of dangerous weather conditions, the flight may be delayed or postponed. We will keep you informed in real time and offer alternatives.

destinations.a1: We cover over 23,000 airports in 165 countries. Whether for a domestic flight in Morocco or an intercontinental journey, we can arrange your flight to almost any destination.
destinations.a2: Yes, we can arrange complex itineraries with multiple stops. This is ideal for business tours or multi-destination tourist trips.
destinations.q3: Can I land at small airports?
destinations.a3: Yes, one of the advantages of private jets is access to thousands of regional and private airports inaccessible to commercial flights, bringing you closer to your final destination.
